document_data.name: Akhir
document_data.mainbody: '''Akhir''' was a ruined city which was taken into a subdimensional bubble by [[Martek]] to serve as a test within his [[Tomb of Martek|tomb]] after its inhabitants had all died. The [[Lancers of Death]] began every nightly assault on the [[Crypt of Al-Alisk]] from the city's ruins.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|124}}
